surveyPrompt: Please complete a quick survey about your recent visit. Reply 1 for an SMS survey. Reply 2 to receive an automated phone call
question1: On a scale of 1-10, how would you rate today's session overall?
question2: On a scale of 1-10, how likely are you to recommend us to a friend?
question3: If there's any other feedback you have, please share it here. Otherwise, reply "N"

welcome: Hello. Please use your phone's keypad to enter the numeric responses to the following survey questions. To skip a question, press the # key
question1: Using your phone's keypad to enter a number between 1 and 10, how would you rate today's session overall?
question2: Using your phone's keypad to enter a number between 1 and 10, how likely are you to recommend us to a friend?
thankYou: Thank you for your feedback! Your call is complete... Goodbye!
